column5: Just wanted to give a heads up to fellow board members that there is a fun, 100% payback, Drum tournament on Quinte this Saturday. Catch and release of course - unless you want to attempt the unthinkable  Its $30 a boat.  3 fish per boat.  Its our third time and I'm sure it'll be a blast again. We always seem to catch them went walleye fishing...so now you go walleye fishing and when you catch a drum is a "good thing" lol.  More details can be found here:  http://forum2.quintefishing.com/viewtopic.php?f=1&t=17607
